summary: Replaces the one-handed backward power attack animation.
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys,

I\'ve always felt the backwards power attack for one-handed weapons was kinda...off
This seeks to remedy that, instead of stepping back and doing a chop attack, you will instead use the two handed backwards power attack, and grip your sword with both hands and do a turning slash. This preserves the vanilla Skyrim feel, instead of having a flashy anime moveset that doesn\'t fit very well with the game. 

To install, just place the Meshes folder inside of your data folder

To uninstall go to data/meshes/actors/character/animations and delete the \"1hm_attackpowerbwd.hkx\" file
author: Shady_Sam
